--count function--
SELECT COUNT(t2.[OrderNo]) as [OrderCount]
    FROM [dbo].[persons] as t1 
    left join [dbo].[orders] as t2 on t1.[Id_P]=t2.[Id_P]
    WHERE T2.[Id_P]=3

--order by--
SELECT T1.[Id_P] AS [ip],t1.[LastName],t1.[FirstName],t2.[company] AS [orderclient]
    FROM [dbo].[persons] as t1 
    left join [dbo].[orders] as t2 on t1.[Id_P]=t2.[Id_P]
    ORDER BY T1.[Id_P]

--group by--
SELECT [orders].[company] AS [clinet]
    FROM [dbo].[orders] 
    GROUP BY [orders].[company]
